name: Monday Pleas(e)
description:
You are stuck in a loop with seemingly no end.

Monday Pleas(e) is a game about nothing, yet we think connects with everyone at one stage or another throughout their lives. There is no point but the one you make. Poignant existential horror.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/monday-please

Made for Ludum Dare 47 (theme: stuck in a loop) by SirJonthe (ray-caster) and qhoang.
